---
title: Official Theme Templates
---

# Official Theme Templates

Rhyolite offers official theme templates to help you create beautiful, maintainable Obsidian themes with ease.

## Available Templates

- **Minimal** — Clean, modern, and easy to extend
- **Dark** — Accessible, high-contrast dark mode
- **Custom** — Start from scratch with a best-practices setup

## Usage Example

```sh
pnpm create rhyolite@latest my-theme -- --theme minimal
```

Replace `minimal` with `dark` or `custom` to use a different template.

## Customization

All theme templates are fully customizable. Tweak styles, add assets, and make it your own.
